short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A calculator to compute staking APY for staking in crypto.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take the guesswork out of crypto yield farming with our easy-to-use APY calculator. Whether you're staking stablecoins, DeFi tokens, or altcoins, this extension helps you accurately calculate your staking rewards based on key variables like the reward rate, time period, and compounding frequency.
